message:
Survivors were able to speak at the sentencing of Brock Franklin, a human trafficking ringleader. Franklin was found guilty on 30 counts including human trafficking, sexual exploitation of a child, child prostitution, and kidnapping by an Arapahoe County. His received 472 years. 
#Justice
http://j.mp/2mZnXMv
